alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hansford; Hartley; Ochiltree; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 02 at 12:25PM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE NORTHWEST AND NORTH-CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree and Hartley. * 20 Foot Winds...West 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 16 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...4 TO 6. * Timing...Through 6 pm.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
